channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The CrowdStrike chaos will happen again. Here‚Äôs why.
item.description: As tech companies get bigger, they create more ‚Äúsingle points of failure‚Äù that can lead to cascading catastrophes across our connected world.

item.title: Southwest to get rid of open seating, offer extra legroom in biggest shift in its history
item.description: Southwest is under pressure to drum up revenue from an oversupplied U.S. market and an activist investor.

item.title: Nasdaq rises, attempts to recover from earlier losses: Live updates
item.description: Stocks rose on Thursday as Wall Street attempted to recover from the worst session since 2022 for the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite.

item.title: Oil prices end higher on pause in risk-asset selloff
item.description: Oil futures settled higher Thursday, with U.S. and global benchmark prices rebounding from their lowest prices in more than six weeks and supported by a similar rise in other risk assets after a recent slump.

item.title: Harris blasts Trump vision as one of 'chaos, fear and hate' in fiery teachers union speech
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris argued that Donald Trump and his Republican allies want to bring the United States back to the past, not into a brighter future.

item.title: Lineage begins trading in the market's largest IPO of 2024
item.description: Lineage, the largest temperature-controlled warehouse REIT in the world, rose by as much as 5% after going public under the ticker symbol "LINE."

item.title: Plan your trade and trade your plan!

Tomorrow I‚Äôd like you to join me LIVE at 11AM EST MONDAY for a special market rundown as well as my thoughts behind my Bullseye Pick of the Week. [‚Ä¶]

item.title: Gold falls to a three-week low, gets caught up in risk-asset selloff
item.description: Gold dropped more than 2% on Thursday after a better-than-expected reading on U.S. gross domestic product fed the potential for higher-for-longer U.S. interest rates, which contributed to a drop in the price of the precious metal to the lowest level in more than two weeks.

item.title: Small caps are finally getting their moment in the sun. Here's why managers think the rally can last
item.description: Small caps have underperformed for roughly the past decade, but they have typically done better historically.

item.title: Small caps are finally getting their moment in the sun. Here's why managers think the rally can last
item.description: Small caps have underperformed for roughly the past decade, but they have typically done better historically.

item.title: Kamala Harris pitches student-loan forgiveness to teachers union: ‚ÄòA future where no teacher has to struggle with the burden‚Äô
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris highlighted the Biden administration‚Äôs efforts to cancel student debt and aimed to draw a stark contrast between the White House‚Äôs record and Republicans‚Äô approach to the issue when she spoke to a major teachers union in Houston on Thursday.

item.title: OpenAI announces a search engine called SearchGPT; Alphabet shares dip
item.description: OpenAI announced a prototype of its SearchGPT search engine on Thursday.

item.title: Alphabet‚Äôs stock falls as OpenAI teases ChatGPT search prototype
item.description: OpenAI calls its offering ‚Äútemporary‚Äù and for a select group of users before the company builds the ‚Äúbest‚Äù features into ChatGPT.

item.title: Ford shares, on pace for worst day since 2008, lead autos rout after company's disappointing earnings
item.description: Shares of Ford were off by more than 18% in early trading Thursday ‚Äì on pace for their worst decline since 2008.

item.title: 'Deadpool & Wolverine' set for highest opening of an R-rated film
item.description: Disney and Marvel's "Deadpool & Wolverine" is expected to shatter box office records and become the highest opening film with an R-rating.
